settings.title_text: All you need to know about The Straits Times

settings.html_content:
News at your fingertips

Read the news on the go, even when offline. The day’s news automatically downloads to your tablet over Wi-Fi.

Save & share easily

Conveniently store digital newspaper clippings in your phone gallery, or share them with your loved ones.

Expand your reading, expand you world

Read other titles to gain different perspectives with our lineup of magazines.

Looking for customisation?

Get in touch and we will find the best solution for your team.

carousel_items.html_content: Unlock access to every Premium story, every feature and all the insights online with The Straits Times All-Digital Package.
Easily access The Straits Times News Tablet app on the Samsung Galaxy Tab A (10.1") Wi-Fi® with up to 1-year Samsung Standard Warranty

settings.title_text: A new way of meeting your reading needs on demand

carousel_items.html_content:
A more seamless way to read digitally.

Enjoy a seamless digital reading experience on the Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 (Wi-Fi) with the pre-installed SPH Tab app. The app auto-launches with a one-time log in.

Get your daily news anywhere. No hassle.

With automatic downloaded news onto your tablet daily in a Wi-Fi environment, you can access news on your tablet on the go and anywhere, even in an offline space.

Digital news-clipping and social media sharing features.

Save and organise your articles conveniently in your gallery, or share interesting articles and attractive deals with your loved ones.

News Tablet Device Protection Plan

Your News Tablet comes with a complimentary News Tablet Device Protection Plan that is valid for 30 months. With the News Tablet Device Protection Plan, your tablet is protected against accidental damages and loss throughout the duration of your news subscription.

This plan is underwritten by Great Eastern General Insurance Limited.
Your tablet is covered up to a maximum of two repairs or one replacement during the period of insurance. Find out more in the FAQ section below.

steps_items.item_text: Read as many articles as you want on The Business Times website

accordian_items.question: Why will it take so long to receive my tablet?
accordian_items.html_content:
We are experiencing a delay in tablet shipments due to the COVID-19 outbreak. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience and our sincere thanks for your patience during this period. We are working hard to get your orders in as soon as we can.

Even before you receive your tablet, you will already be able to enjoy full access to The Straits Times website and app from the moment you purchase your tablet subscription. Please see Question 5 for more details.

accordian_items.question: When will my tablet be ready for redemption?
accordian_items.html_content: We expect to receive new stocks of the tablet by the end of April. You will receive a redemption letter via email once your tablet is ready for collection. All details on the redemption process will be provided in the email.

accordian_items.question: When will I be charged for my subscription plan?
accordian_items.html_content:
If you purchase our News Tablet subscription between 18 March 2020 and 29 April 2020, your subscription will start on 1 May 2020.

Your first payment will occur on the day you purchase your subscription, and will cover the first period of your subscription starting 1 May 2020. This is illustrated in the table below:.



Monthly recurring

Yearly recurring

First payment

When will I be charged?

Upon purchase of subscription

Upon purchase of subscription

How much will I be charged?

Subscription fees for the first month, i.e. 1 May 2020to 31 May 2020

Subscription fees for the first year, i.e. 1 May 2020to 30 Apr 2021

Second payment

When will I be charged?

1 June 2020*

1 May 2021**

How much will I be charged?

Subscription fees for the second month, i.e. 1 June2020 to 30 June 2020

Subscription fees for the second year, i.e. 1 May 2021to 30 Apr 2022

accordian_items.question: Can I read The Straits Times in the meantime?
accordian_items.html_content:
Yes, you will be able to enjoy full access to The Straits Times website and app from the day of your subscription. This access will be complimentary until 1 May 2020. (refer to Question 4 for more details).

Simply log on to straitstimes.com or The Straits Times app with your account details to start reading.

accordian_items.question: Does this package come with a print copy delivered to my office?
accordian_items.html_content: No, this is a digital subscription to The Business Times and it does not include the print newspaper.

accordian_items.question: Is a seat = a subscription?
accordian_items.html_content: Yes.

accordian_items.question: How do I know if I am eligible for these subscription plans?
accordian_items.html_content:
All corporate subscribers with a registered commercial address are eligible to subscribe.

Individual subscribers with a residential address can browse our subscription packages at www.subscribe.sph.com.sg.

accordian_items.question: When will the billing for my subscription start?
accordian_items.html_content:
Your subscription will officially start within 1 day from the date of your purchase.

Your first billing will begin 2-3 working days after your purchase and will cover the first period of your subscription (be it monthly recurring or yearly payments) from your official subscription start date.

See table below for a subscription purchased on 1 Jun 2020 as an illustration:



Monthly recurring

Yearly

First payment

When will I be charged?

2-3 working days after your date of purchase

2-3 working days after your date of purchase

How much will I be charged?

Subscription fee for the first month, i.e. 3 June, 2020 to 30 June, 2020

Subscription fee for the first year, i.e. 3 June, 2020 to 31 May, 2021

Second payment

When will I be charged?

1 July, 2020

Cycle repeats upon renewal of subscription

How much will I be charged?

Subscription fee for the second month, i.e. July 1, 2020 to July 31, 2020

accordian_items.question: How many concurrent accesses do I get with each seat?
accordian_items.html_content: You get 1 access to the businesstimes.com.sg and 1 access to the BT app concurrently.

accordian_items.question: What happens if I want to terminate my subscription?
accordian_items.html_content: You can call our Customer Service Hotline at 6388 3838 or email circs@sph.com.sg for assistance.

accordian_items.question: How do I make payment?
accordian_items.html_content: We accept various credit cards, cheques, bank transfers etc.

accordian_items.question: Can’t find what you’re looking for?
accordian_items.html_content:
You can call our Customer Service Hotline at 6388 3838 or email circs@sph.com.sg for assistance.

Our Customer Service Hotline operates from Mon – Fri, 8.30am to 6pm, excluding Public Holidays.

accordian_items.question: Does this package come with a print copy delivered to my home?
accordian_items.html_content: No, this is a digital subscription to The Business Times and it does not include the print newspaper.

accordian_items.question: How do I know if I’m eligible for this promotion?
accordian_items.html_content: Yes.

accordian_items.question: Do I have to pay two delivery fees if I subscribe to two newspapers?
accordian_items.html_content: If you are delivering more than one publication to the same residential address under the same subscriber account, you will only be charged one delivery fee for that residential address and account.

accordian_items.question: When will my subscription start after I have purchased it?
accordian_items.html_content:
If you have purchased your subscription through our website, your subscription will start on or around 3 working days later.

If you have purchased your subscription through our Customer Service hotline, your subscription will typically start either on the 1st or the 15th day of the upcoming month.

For subscriptions with a digital component, you will receive an email with your mySPH user ID and password within 24 hours of purchasing the subscription. Once you have received these login details, you can start using your digital subscription on the publication’s website and/or mobile app.

For subscribers who were previously paying newspaper vendors for their subscriptions and are now converting to become SPH direct subscribers, your SPH subscription will start on the 1st of the upcoming month, subject to 3 working days’ notice.

accordian_items.question: What time will my newspapers be delivered to me?
accordian_items.html_content:
If you subscribe to our print newspapers, they will be delivered to you by 7.30am daily unless unless exceptional circumstances occur, such as press breakdowns or late breaking news.

For subscriptions to evening newspapers (Lianhe Wanbao and Shin Min Daily News), subscribers will receive each day’s newspaper the following morning, by 7.30am.

accordian_items.question: Why should I subscribe if I can read most articles online for free?
accordian_items.html_content:
Many of the articles on our news websites and apps, including breaking news stories on developments in Singapore and the world, are free for all to access.

However, some of our best content, produced by our experienced journalists in Singapore and in our foreign bureaus, are made available only to subscribers. To unlock these Premium articles, subscribe to any of our digital packages here.

accordian_items.question: Will my subscription be automatically renewed?
accordian_items.html_content:
Monthly/ Yearly Recurring Payment Arrangement:
If your subscription is on a monthly (or yearly) recurring payment arrangement, we will continue to charge you the prevailing subscription fee after your contract expires. The monthly (or annual) subscription fee will be subject to the prevailing prices of your subscription package.

If you wish to change your subscription package, please log in to your mySPH account by clicking on the Login button at the top right hand corner of this site. Once logged in, click into “Your subscriptions” to change your subscription package.

If you wish to cancel, please email us at circs@sph.com.sg or call our Customer Service Hotline at 6388 3838. Kindly note that we require 30 days notice for all terminations.

Full Payment:
A renewal letter will be sent to you six weeks before your subscription ends. If you would like to renew your subscription, you can mail back the confirmation slip and payment details, or email us at circs@sph.com.sg.

accordian_items.question: Can I subscribe with a corporate account and/or office address?
accordian_items.html_content: To purchase a corporate subscription or arrange for newspaper delivery to an office address, please email us at circs@sph.com.sg or call our hotline at 6388 3838.

accordian_items.question: Can newspapers be delivered outside Singapore?
accordian_items.html_content:
Yes, we are able to accept overseas print subscriptions but please note that there will be additional freight charges (depending on the location) and fuel surcharges (depending on the fuel rate at the time of subscription) for delivery of newspapers to an overseas address.

Please email us at circs@sph.com.sg or call our hotline at 6388 3838 for the rates depending on your location.

accordian_items.question: How can I pay for my subscription?
accordian_items.html_content:
We accept payments via credit card or DBS GIRO for subscriptions made through our website.

For other methods of payment, please call our Customer Service Hotline at 6388 3838 or email us at circs@sph.com.sg for assistance.

accordian_items.question: What happens after my contract expires?
accordian_items.html_content:
If your subscription is on a monthly (or yearly) recurring payment arrangement, we will continue to charge you the prevailing subscription fee after your contract expires. The monthly (or annual) subscription fee will be subject to the prevailing prices of your subscription package.

If you wish to change your subscription package, please log in to your mySPH account by clicking on the Login button at the top right hand corner of this site. Once logged in, click into “Your subscriptions” to change your subscription package.

If you wish to cancel, please email us at circs@sph.com.sg or call our Customer Service Hotline at 6388 3838. Kindly note that we require 30 days notice for all terminations.

accordian_items.question: Can newspapers be delivered outside Singapore?
accordian_items.html_content:
Yes, we are able to accept overseas print subscriptions but please note that there will be additional freight charges (depending on the location) and fuel surcharges (depending on the fuel rate at the time of subscription) for delivery of newspapers to an overseas address.

Please email us at circs@sph.com.sg or call our hotline at 6388 3838 for the rates depending on your location.

accordian_items.question: How can I pay for my subscription?
accordian_items.html_content:
We accept payments via credit card or DBS GIRO for subscriptions made through our website.

For other methods of payment, please call our Customer Service Hotline at 6388 3838 or email us at circs@sph.com.sg for assistance.

accordian_items.question: What happens after my contract expires?
accordian_items.html_content:
If your subscription is on a monthly (or yearly) recurring payment arrangement, we will continue to charge you the prevailing subscription fee after your contract expires. The monthly (or annual) subscription fee will be subject to the prevailing prices of your subscription package.

If you wish to change your subscription package, please log in to your mySPH account by clicking on the Login button at the top right hand corner of this site. Once logged in, click into “Your subscriptions” to change your subscription package.

If you wish to cancel, please email us at circs@sph.com.sg or call our Customer Service Hotline at 6388 3838. Kindly note that we require 30 days notice for all terminations.

testi.testi_content: We had an incredible experience working with Landify and were impressed they made such a big difference in only three weeks. Our team is so grateful for the wonderful improvements they made and their ability to get familiar with the concept so quickly. It acted as a catalyst to take our design to the next level and get more eyes on our product.

Fermin Apps has collaborated with Landify team for several projects such as Photo Sharing Apps and Custom Social Networking Apps. The experience has been pleasant, professional and exceeding our expectations. The team is always thinking beyond the current tasks & helps us formulate a vision and possibilities for future.
